text: Allahala kurbanicya janavarance na mansa pohacate na tyance rakta kimbahuna tyala tumacya manata asalele allahace bhaya pohocate, tyacapramane allahane tya janavaranna tumace ajnadharaka (tabedara) banavile ahe, yasathi ki tumhi tyacya margadarsana (cya abhara) ta tyaci mahanata varnana karavi ani satkarma karanaryanna khusakhabari aikava
